name: 2Musikewl 4Skewl
description:
This was our attempt at making a stealth based rhythm game, which we soon learnt was much harder than originally planned.

Our boy Leslie here is trying to escape detention to save himself the monotony of school, Leslie must use the louder sounds of the Rhythm to move through undetected while pausing at the quieter moments.

The game is very unfinished and full of forgotten dreams, enjoy!

Code: @Swagdorf/@TheAioliGuy
Animation: @Aravien12 ‏ 
Art: @Trenogre
Music: https://soundcloud.com/user-264956231-73983251
